meanings.definition: Moving or operating at a very low speed.
meanings.sent1: The snail was ultraslow as it crawled across the garden.
meanings.sent2: The turtle's ultraslow pace allowed the rabbit to win the race.
meanings.sent3: The sloth's ultraslow movements made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass ultraslow during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The glacier's movement was ultraslow, shaping the landscape over centuries.

meanings.definition: Extremely slow in progress or development.
meanings.sent1: The ultraslow growth of the plant surprised the gardener.
meanings.sent2: The project's ultraslow pace frustrated the team members.
meanings.sent3: The snail's ultraslow journey to the finish line was comical.
meanings.sent4: The ultraslow decline of the ancient civilization puzzled historians.
meanings.sent5: The internet connection was ultraslow, causing delays in the video stream.
